title: Tina Turner What's Love  Do With It RINGTONE (Big Papi) iPhone+A
description:
[i]These are ringtones for Android and iPhone, which means each track is a snippet of the full song. As a smarty pants pointed out, the MP3 Android ringtones will also work for those with Windows-based mobiles. BlackBerry too!
 
Big Papi is new at making ringtones so if you have any suggestions please let Big Papi know.

- Big Papi[/i]

[b]BlackBerry users, place the ringtones in the Blackberry/Ringtones folder then reboot (remove battery) to see the tones in your ringtone list[/b]

[b]For iPhone users import the m4r files into your iTunes ringtone area then sync the phone.[/b]

[b]For Android users you may want to create a "ringtone" folder so these don't get mixed up with full songs. The folder should already be there by default.[/b]
